thread.title: Kenneth Radner
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kenneth Radner

author: Kenneth Radner
title: Kenneth Radner
text: The sales person spent lots of time explaining the mattresses and the different benefits of different types of mattresses He was very informative and patient. You can tell that he spent lots of time studying up on all the different types of mattresses. I am also in sales and I appreciate when I work with a sales person who is informative and helpful And not aggressive.
